alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Colquitt; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 3:54PM EDT until July 09 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN THOMAS...NORTHWESTERN BROOKS AND WESTERN COLQUITT COUNTIES... At 353 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Pelham to 6 miles east of Thomasville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Doerun, Pavo, Coolidge, Riverside, Schley, Funston, Barwick, Autreyville, Enon, Minnesota, Patten, Center Hill, South Moultrie, Sigsbee, Moultrie Municipal A/P, Poplar Arbor Church, Hollis, Bay and Murphy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
